preprocess module¶

class preprocess.Preprocessor[source]¶

Bases: object

Preprocessor class provides methods to tokenize, lemmatize and remove stopwords

lemmatize(tokens)[source]¶

Returns Base forms (lemmatizes) of input list of words :param tokens: List of tokens :type tokens: list

Returns

List of lemmatized tokens

Return type

list

preprocess(text)[source]¶

Preprocesses the input text :param text: Text to be pre-processed :type text: str

Returns

List of pre-processed tokens

Return type

list

rem_stop(tokens)[source]¶

Removes stop words from input tokens Args: tokens(list) : List of tokens Returns: list: List of tokens with stopwords removed

tokenize(sent)[source]¶

Tokenizes the input into ref_words :param sent: Sentence to be tokenized :type sent: str

Returns

List of tokenized words

Return type

list
